title: Haier 278 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Moon Silver, HEF-27TMS)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, Warranty Card, Ice Tray, Key, Egg Tray
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features, 3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty is Not Valid in Case of the Following Events: If the Product has been Installed, Serviced, Repaired, Opened or Tampered by Any Unauthorized Personnel or Technician. If Defects Arise or Caused by Accidents, Alteration, Misuse, Neglect, Substitution of Original Components with Spurious or Non-genuine Components, Attacked by Household Pest or Rodents, Flood, Earthquake, Lightning or Any Other Act of God or Natural Calamities. The Product is Shifted Outside India. Warranty does not Cover Plastic, Glassware and Bulb

product_description.Twin Inverter Technology: Integrated with Twin Inverter technology, this refrigerator ensures that both the fan motor and the compressor run on DC, resulting in fewer fluctuations, minimal noise, and energy savings.
product_description.Energy-efficient Performance: This refrigerator comes with two energy-saving modes that can help you save energy in both Mode One and Convertible Mode.

review:
It's an awesome refrigerator as per my family requirements. Got a good deal on Flipkart and delivery & installation was also super quick (within 24-hours of placing order I had my refrigerator delivered and working at my place).

But the Exchange offer of Flipkart is a BIG SCAM AKA TOTAL JHOL.. They want the existing product that we are using in BRAND NEW condition. Even if your product is properly working the delivery person will not approve the exchange. They have trained their delivery persons the best in disapproving the exchange.

If that existing product is in that brand new condition than why on Earth would I will willingly give it away to you at mere Rs. 1500-2000!!!!!!!! If one is using any product for more than a year or two obviously there will be some wear and tear after it's a machine and that is reason of giving it away at the negligible exchange value. But Flipkart doesn't consider it. They want new products in exchange.

Putting efforts to write this review after multiple experience from Flipkart's Exchange Scam.

If Flipkart is that concerned it should also provide buy-back guarantee on the products purchased via them.

Great product with good value for money. Demo guys visited on time. The biggest inconvenience was that the delivery guys did not drop the fridge at my doorstep! They instead asked me to come over to them further away from my home and pick it up from there as they were not willing to drive all the way to my house due to narrow roads. Well flipkart doesn't mention anything about narrow roads restriction in their delivery promise policy. Plus I have mini trucks accessing the area I live day and night!! It was frustrating but they left me with no options. So I drove all the way to them and then hired a local carriage guy to take the fridge home and obviously it was not for free. Very disappointing delivery service I have to say. Not happy. Nevertheless, I have placed another order from Flipkart and hope that they will follow the right protocol this time.

Is a perfect fit for my house. I was looking for a compact fridge with depth as low as possible so that fits in my kitchen corner place. And it did perfectly even after leaving an inch gap at the back from the wall. Cooling capacity is very impressive. Only thing that I felt could be improved is the ice tray. Its fixed to the bottom container and is almost impossible to fill with water. But that doesnt make this a bad purchase decision. You can always get one extra ice tray as per your design preference. Installation was smooth as usual with Haier the very next day, the engineer who came for installation suggested to take up 3 year extended warranty on top of the first 1 year that the company is offering. This cost me 2550 rupees and is worth it I thought.
Overall a perfect fridge for working couple who tend to store substantial groceries and items through the week.
The convertible feature is very handy when I am going out for extended period of time.

Excellent product, Fast delivery from Flipkart Team.
Instant Installation from Haier Service Team.
Cooling is excellent in the refrigerator, all the modes work properly and super freeze mode is works properly.
Paint finish is excellent and aesthetically it look very good.
value for money product from Haier as compared to other brands in market.

FRIDGE IS VERY NICE AND DELIVERED TO ME IN GOOD CONDITION AND THE PRODUCTS PERFORMS VERY WELL I THOROUGHLY ENQUIRED IN MARKET AND FIND THIS AS BEST PRODUCT UNDER THIS PRICE IN THIS SEGMENT AND AND FIRST TIME IT WAS LONG TIME TO GET THE COOLING AND THEN IT WAS GETTING COOLING VERY FASTLY AND I PURCHASED THIS FOR MY BUSINESS AND HAVING LOT OF SPACE TO PUT THE STORAGE ITEMS MORE AND THANK U FLIPKART FOR THE PRODUCT I GOT THIS FOR RS19000/-
Good product and the features are really good compared to other refrigerator's .It's worth buy and I am satisfied with the product.Go for it

Posting review after 1 month. It's good product thanks to Flipkart for the quick delivery and good price quotation. This product have amazing technology of converting freezer to fridge. When it converts power saving will be 5 star. It has movable ice tray. I'm happy about the product.
It was very nice deal with flipkart....go for it....
a decent refrigerator at a decent price

I have raised a complaint against the product and u guys have not sorted out.. I am not at all satisfied with the service and in future I will not buy any products in future..

AND I WILL TELL MY FRIENDS AND RELATIVES TO NOT TO USE FLIPKART...
NOT SATISFIED AT ALL...
